select p.contentId,p.title,p.overview,p.addr1,p.addr2,p.mapX,p.mapY,p.mLevel,p.areaCode,p.linkedURL,p.firstImage,l.likeCount from place p left join (select contentId, count(loginId) as likeCount from placeLike group by contentId) l on p.contentId=l.contentId where p.areaCode=#{areaCode} ORDER BY (CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(title,1) BETWEEN '가' AND '힣' THEN 1 WHEN ASCII(SUBSTRING(title,1)) BETWEEN 65 AND 90 THEN 2 WHEN ASCII(SUBSTRING(title,1)) BETWEEN 97 AND 122 THEN 3 WHEN ASCII(SUBSTRING(title,1)) BETWEEN 48 AND 57 THEN 4 ELSE 5 END), title LIMIT #{start},#{perPage}
